metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12828 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player 30.0.0.134 and earlier have a "use of a component with a known vulnerability" vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12828` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 1:20180814.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
flashplugin-installer - 1:20180814.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:20180814.1-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
